name: Foolish Magician
text:
1 Pendulum Monster
If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 card in your Pendulum Zone; Add 1 Pendulum Monster from your Deck to your hand with the same Pendulum Scale as that targeted card and if you do, return that targeted card to the hand. You can only use the effect of "Foolish Magician" once per turn.
